original_title: 教え子の藤井と放課後ラブホで… 理性やモラルなんて何の歯止めにもならない欲情セックス
overview: [Such a temptation, no one can win! ! ] I Know It's No Good, But If It Breaks Out, I Can't Stop Runaway SEX! I'm the homeroom teacher who promised to do anything if I got a perfect score on the test. I'm going to have a baby soon, and I should be the most thorough in both my work and private life, but I'm defeated by Fujii's squeaky requests and sweet, thin voice. "I want to keep going" "Teacher, you can still do H, right?"
title: At a love hotel after school with my student Fujii... Lustful sex that can't be stopped by reason or morals
